Literature.Title: Designed symmetrical β-hairpin peptides for treating multidrug-resistant salmonella typhimurium infections.
Literature.Author: Ma Z, Zhang D, Cheng Z, Niu Y, Kong L, Lu Z, Bie X

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=8µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=32µg/ml),Escherichia coli O157:H7(MIC=2µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Paratyphi A CICC 21501(MIC=4µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Paratyphi B CICC 21495(MIC=2µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Paratyphi C CICC 21512(MIC=2µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Choleraesuis ATCC 13312(MIC=1µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Choleraesuis CICC 21493 (MIC=16µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis CICC 21527(MIC=16µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Wandsworth CICC 21504(MIC=16µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium CICC 21483(MIC=16µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium CICC 21913(MIC=64µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Blockley CICC 21489(MIC=32µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Dublin CICC 21497(MIC=8µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 700408(MIC=32µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 700408(MIC=16µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 700408(MIC=64µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 700408(MIC=128µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=4µg/ml),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(40-50% Cytotoxicity=128µg/ml)
